mapper.select: SELECT o.order_no, o.order_time, o.delivery_status, o.invoice_number, o.member_id, max(pay.actual_payment_amount) as totalPayments, max(prod.product_image) as product_image, max(prod.product_name) as product_name, count(d.order_no) as totalOrderCnt FROM products prod inner JOIN detailed_order_items d on prod.product_id = d.product_id inner JOIN payments pay on d.order_no = pay.order_no inner join order_history o on pay.order_no = o.order_no where member_id = #{memberId} group by o.order_no;
select order_no from order_history where member_id = #{memberId}
select count(*) from detailed_order_items where order_no = #{orderNo}
